DIRegistrationJsonConfiguration Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in DIRegistrationJsonConfiguration.h

Overview

Use this class optionally if you prefer to provide json configuration at run time

  pILConfiguration

Configure pILConfiguration to provide campaignId, micrositeId etc if not provided in json file.

@property (nonatomic, readonly) DIPILConfiguration *pILConfiguration

Discussion

Configure pILConfiguration to provide campaignId, micrositeId etc if not provided in json file.
